about.description:
HoloViews is an open-source Python library designed to make data analysis
and visualization seamless and simple. With HoloViews, you can usually
express what you want to do in very few lines of code, letting you focus on
what you are trying to explore and convey, not on the process of plotting.
about.summary: Stop plotting your data - annotate your data and let it visualize itself.

about.description:
HoloViews is an open-source Python library designed to make data analysis
and visualization seamless and simple. With HoloViews, you can usually
express what you want to do in very few lines of code, letting you focus on
what you are trying to explore and convey, not on the process of plotting.
about.summary: Stop plotting your data - annotate your data and let it visualize itself.

name: holoviews
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.20.0" %}

package:
  name: holoviews
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/h/holoviews/holoviews-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 29d183045fafa3d846deda999d9687b99b8abdc1a8c06712e54afa576bb02b3e

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
  entry_points:
    - holoviews = holoviews.util.command:main

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - hatchling
    - hatch-vcs
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - bokeh >=3.1
    - colorcet
    - matplotlib-base >=3.0
    - numpy >=1.21
    - packaging
    - pandas >=1.3
    - panel >=1.0
    - param >=2.0,<3.0
    - pyviz_comms >=2.1

test:
  imports:
    - holoviews
  commands:
    - pip check
    - holoviews -h
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://holoviews.org
  summary: Stop plotting your data - annotate your data and let it visualize itself.
  description: |
    HoloViews is an open-source Python library designed to make data analysis
    and visualization seamless and simple. With HoloViews, you can usually
    express what you want to do in very few lines of code, letting you focus on
    what you are trying to explore and convey, not on the process of plotting.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  dev_url: https://github.com/holoviz/holoviews
  doc_url: http://holoviews.org/getting_started/index.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jlstevens
    - philippjfr
    - basnijholt
    - maximlt
    - hoxbro
